alert.note: Alert for Caddo; De Soto (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 12:09PM CDT until April 06 at 8:02PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Shreveport LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Cypress Bayou At Wallace Lake affecting Caddo and De Soto Parishes. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is currently forecast. * WHERE...Cypress Bayou At Wallace Lake. * WHEN...From this afternoon through next week. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 146.8 feet. - Forecast...The lake is forecast to rise above flood stage on Saturday and crest at 152.0 feet on Sunday Evening. The lake will slowly fall below flood stage by midweek. - Flood stage is 151.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued this evening at 815 PM CDT.
